title: Event Step Configuration
description: Python event step that subscribes to 'users-segmented' and emits 'content-personalized' for AI-powered content personalization.

title: Content Personalization Logic
description: Core personalization logic that processes each recipient and applies AI-powered or basic personalization based on user preferences.

title: AI-Powered Personalization
description: Advanced AI personalization functions for subject lines and content based on user metadata, VIP status, and purchase history.

title: Personalized Content Storage
description: Stores personalized emails in Motia state and emits event to continue the email automation workflow.

title: User Segmentation Logic
description: Helper function to determine if user is new based on signup date for targeted personalization.
